p: The purified fungal ITS and bacterial 16S rRNA genomic DNA was subjected to the ABI StepOnePlus Real-Time PCR System (Life Technologies Foster City, CA, United States) according to Zhao et al. (2017). Purified amplicons were pooled in equimolar amounts and paired-end sequenced (2 Ã— 250) on an Illumina platform according to the standard protocols. The raw reads were deposited in the NCBI Sequence Read Archive (SRA) database (Accession Number: SRP262260).
